title: 1.7.2MCPC+服务端添加暮色MOD后报错
author: 安反子
txt_content:
求原因和解决办法OTL...实在不想放弃暮色MOD

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Quite honestly, I wouldn't worry myself about that.

Time: 15/06/13 17:52
Description: Exception in server tick loop

cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: cpw.mods.fml.common.registry.GameRegistry.registerBlock(Lnet/minecraft/block/Block;Ljava/lang/Class;Ljava/lang/String;[Ljava/lang/Object;)Lnet/minecraft/block/Block;

replies.author: 安反子
replies.txt_content:
雨瞳 发表于 2015-6-15 14:01
还加了别的模组吗？
把所有插件和MOD都去掉只放暮色也还是不行...去掉暮色就没问题,大概是服务端本身有什么问题...直接搜了个别的带暮色的整合清理了一下现在已经弄好了
